body:
The manga has an arc named Musk Dynasty whose antagonists were the results of breeding between the men of the clan and the animals they fought who they deemed strong and worthy that were turned into girls in order to get strong offspring who had the powers of their beast mothers.

So yes Ranma can get pregnant, ¿now who would try to do that? imo Happosai he was the only man enough in the manga to try to get female Ranma for himself even if she was originally a guy he didn't mind, he tried to use hipnotism and cursed ítems but failed.

Fortunately the manga has a open ending so Akane and Ranma never become a thing (the only couple formed was Ryoga and sone girl that doesn't appear in the anime)  I like to think at some point Happosai trickery worked like in this hentai and he got Ranma for himself even  making Ranma conceive a couple of kids.
this topic need to be explored, could female ranma get pregnant

The old man it's the strongest character in the series, he actually as done a lot of touching on the mc female form even lick his tits and butt, which its perplexing because that was aired on the anime wonder how the cancel culture would react to this xD, of course they never had sex just touching, mc sometimes used his female form to let old man drop his guard and beat him. Lets say up to page 11 could happened on the anime.
I don’t know the anime but for some reason the old man has not been beaten to death and it’s mildly annoying

Maho, u know as much as anyone else that he needs hot water.

He has been weakened by a moxibustion and is tied up.
He can just turn back into a guy
“There’s no way he can be an enemy since he made us a chair.” - Hermes from JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure: Stone Ocean
